error.submitError: If the error persists, please drop by Discourse forum and let us know, or raise an issue on GitHub. Thanks!

index.metaDescription: Build your DIY sensor and become part of the worldwide citizen science, open data, civic tech network. Supported by a lot of contributors 💕
index.metaTitle: Sensor.Community 🌐 Build your own sensor and join the worldwide civic tech network
index.message-description: Sensor.Community is a contributors driven global sensor network that creates Open Environmental Data.
index.message-mission: Our mission is to inspire and enrich people’s lives by offering a platform for the collective curiosity in nature that is genuine, joyful and positive.
index.message-hubs: Sensor.Community has global hubs in Stuttgart, Sofía, Warsaw, Brussels.

sensor.metaTitle: Find your sensor and building instructions for your DYI fine dust sensor
sensor.subtitle: Find our guides️ for your sensor

donate.metaDescription: We are non-profit, non-corporate and non-compromised. People like you help us. We rely on donations to carry out our mission.
donate.metaTitle: Donate - help us by showing your love
donate.description: We are non-profit, non-corporate and non-compromised. People like you help us. We rely on donations to carry out our mission.
donate.donationDescription: The Open Knowledge Foundation Germany is recognised as a non-profit organisation.
